description: This file defines a NotificationsService class responsible for fetching user notifications from an API endpoint using the Dio HTTP client in a Dart/Flutter project.

classes.name: NotificationsService
classes.description: A service class that handles fetching notifications data from the backend API.

methods.name: getNotifications
methods.description: Fetches notifications for a user by making an HTTP GET request to the '/notifications' endpoint and returns a list of NotificationItem objects.

methods.name: _handleError
methods.description: Handles errors encountered during HTTP requests, extracting message details from DioException or default error message.
